remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需有關如何使用委派處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用不同的滑鼠事件上繪製滑鼠路徑。The following code example demonstrates using different mouse events to draw the path of the mouse on a . 加入直線線段針對每個和所發生的事件。A line segment is added to the for each and events that occur. 若要更新的圖形方法呼叫上每個`MouseDown`和`MouseUp`事件。To update the graphics, the method is called for the on each `MouseDown` and `MouseUp` event. 此外，增加或相應減少時捲動到圖形的路徑就會發生事件。In addition, the graphic path is scrolled up or down when the event occurs. 其他的滑鼠事件，例如，在畫面中，以及識別。Additional mouse events, like , are identified on screen as well. 也會顯示在螢幕上會從滑鼠相關的其他資訊類別。Also displayed on the screen is additional information about the mouse from the class.
